N

name - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.Player
The name of the player
NewGame - Class in com.example.moelkky
NewGame screen gives options to add players and start playing.
NewGame() - Constructor for class com.example.moelkky.NewGame
 
newgamebutton - Variable in class com.example.moelkky.StartGame
NewGame button initiates in OnCreate and calls handleNewGameCall when pressed
newPlayer(String) - Method in class com.example.moelkky.NewGame
Method for generating TextView object from String variable Method takes user input and creates an TextView object with correct attributes and adds it to TableRow row, if user input is too short, will call playerNameTooShortAlert()
newRow() - Method in class com.example.moelkky.Scoreboard
Creates new empty TableRow to TableLayout holding scores Method creates a new TableRow, gives it same attributes as last ones and adds empty TextView (in XML layout, some parameters require that TableRows always has child)
newThrow(int) - Method in class com.example.moelkky.GameScreen
Updates current player with result of throw made Method is called when player presses the button corresponding his last throws result.
newThrow(int) - Method in class com.example.moelkky.Player
Updates object with result of last throw made.
nextPlayer() - Method in class com.example.moelkky.GameScreen
Method changes the next player in game to be the current player Method is called when one player finishes his turn, it checks if there are still other players in game, if so it goes recursively trough the gameOrder list to find next player still in game and updates UI to correspond with the player in question
